body:
Can you try the latest beta here: https://beta.rclone.org/v1.56.0-beta.5416.7afb4487e/

This should have android builds in `testbuilds` (when it has finished building).

This has
- a fix to ncdu
- a new version of the termbox-go library where the crash seems to to be

If that doesn't work then can you run with `--log-file rclone.log` and attach the rclone log as I'm not sure the traceback above is complete - it is certainly confusing me!

Thanks

**EDIT:** Just to clarify: This is on the new version (7afb448) with `--log-file``. 

Same crash (tested with https://beta.rclone.org/v1.56.0-beta.1.7afb448/testbuilds/rclone-android-21-armv8a.gz):

```
2021/04/20 07:47:48 DEBUG : Using config file from "/data/data/com.termux/files/home/rclone-internal/rclone.conf"
2021/04/20 07:47:48 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.56.0-beta.1.7afb448" starting with parameters ["../rclone-beta" "-vvv" "--log-file" "/data/data/com.termux/files/home/ncdu.log" "ncdu" "."]
2021/04/20 07:47:48 DEBUG : Creating backend with remote "."
2021/04/20 07:47:48 DEBUG : fs cache: renaming cache item "." to be canonical "/data/data/com.termux/files/home/rclone"
panic: runtime error: index out of range [14] with length 14

goroutine 1 [running]:
github.com/nsf/termbox-go.Close()
	github.com/nsf/termbox-go@v1.1.0/api.go:146 +0x458
github.com/rclone/rclone/cmd/ncdu.(*UI).Show(0x40001dc960, 0x0, 0x0)
	github.com/rclone/rclone/cmd/ncdu/ncdu.go:852 +0x2a0
github.com/rclone/rclone/cmd/ncdu.glob..func1.1(0x5558839600, 0x4000048040)
	github.com/rclone/rclone/cmd/ncdu/ncdu.go:60 +0x34
github.com/rclone/rclone/cmd.Run(0x7fcf620000, 0x55596c1fe0, 0x40008a7d20)
	github.com/rclone/rclone/cmd/cmd.go:267 +0xc0
github.com/rclone/rclone/cmd/ncdu.glob..func1(0x55596c1fe0, 0x4000112380, 0x1, 0x4)
	github.com/rclone/rclone/cmd/ncdu/ncdu.go:59 +0xa8
github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).execute(0x55596c1fe0, 0x400003d0e0, 0x4, 0x6, 0x55596c1fe0, 0x400003d0e0)
	github.com/spf13/cobra@v1.1.3/command.go:856 +0x1bc
github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).ExecuteC(0x55596ba2e0, 0x0, 0x5, 0x5557159248)
	github.com/spf13/cobra@v1.1.3/command.go:960 +0x244
github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).Execute(...)
	github.com/spf13/cobra@v1.1.3/command.go:897
github.com/rclone/rclone/cmd.Main()
	github.com/rclone/rclone/cmd/cmd.go:566 +0x90
main.main()
	github.com/rclone/rclone/rclone.go:14 +0x18
```

For me, this also hangs the termux session.

I am sure the logs provided above are enough. I just want to add that i too face this error on exiting a active ncdu process. Only difference is I don't face any termux session hang issue . I can type anything normally below that long error message once exited out of ncdu

issue.title: Fix crashes and odd behaviour due to builtin terminfo inconsistencies
issue.body:
In recent commits

- a08d44e997 implemented dim, blink hidden
- b53f34a171 extra attributes wip

3 more attributes were added - hidden, dim and cursive.

Unfortunately these commits didn't adjust the builtin terminfo.

This leads to crashes which look like this on quit

    panic: runtime error: index out of range [14] with length 14
    goroutine 1 [running]:
    github.com/nsf/termbox-go.Close()
        github.com/nsf/termbox-go@v1.1.0/api.go:146 +0x458

And other odd behaviour like arrow keys not being recognised.

This patch fixes the terminfo, and names all the entries to make it
easier to update. It also adds a test to make sure the terminfo
doesn't get out of sync again.

See: https://github.com/rclone/rclone/issues/5259

body:
I bisected this down to this commit in termbox-go: https://github.com/nsf/termbox-go/commit/b53f34a1710006fca36c1ebaabac02e9a614e9eb

Eventually I worked out what was going wrong and submitted an upstream pull request here: https://github.com/nsf/termbox-go/pull/236

Can you try this which has the fix in? It works for me so hopefully will work for you too!

[v1.56.0-beta.5417.c3d1fbdbf.fix-5259-ncdu](https://beta.rclone.org/branch/fix-5259-ncdu/v1.56.0-beta.5417.c3d1fbdbf.fix-5259-ncdu/) on branch [fix-5259-ncdu](https://github.com/rclone/rclone/tree/fix-5259-ncdu) (uploaded in 15-30 mins)

Sorry it's my first time compiling on android, i followed the guide and installed golang and lld using apt, used the command 

`go get -u -v github.com/rclone/rclone@fix-5259-ncdu`

Is this correct?

What do i do next? i backed up rclone and copied the newly built rclone into usr/bin, ran rclone but still the same error?


```
rclone ncdu raven:
panic: runtime error: index out of range [14] with length 14

goroutine 1 [running]:
github.com/nsf/termbox-go.Close()
        /data/data/com.termux/files/home/go/pkg/mod/github.com/nsf/termbox-go@v1.1.0/api.go:146 +0x458
github.com/rclone/rclone/cmd/ncdu.(*UI).Show(0x400047e960, 0x0, 0x0)
        /data/data/com.termux/files/home/go/pkg/mod/github.com/rclone/rclone@v1.55.1-0.20210420123827-c3d1fbdbf616/cmd/ncdu/ncdu.go:852 +0x2f8

github.com/rclone/rclone/cmd.Run(0x7ff9110000, 0x5e47d98920, 0x4000b97d40)
        /data/data/com.termux/files/home/go/pkg/mod/github.com/rclone/rclone@v1.55.1-0.20210420123827-c3d1fbdbf616/cmd/cmd.go:267 +0xb8
github.com/rclone/rclone/cmd/ncdu.glob..func1(0x5e47d98920, 0x4000081230, 0x1, 0x1)
        /data/data/com.termux/files/home/go/pkg/mod/github.com/rclone/rclone@v1.55.1-0.20210420123827-c3d1fbdbf616/cmd/ncdu/ncdu.go:59 +0xa8
github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).execute(0x5e47d98920, 0x4000081080, 0x1, 0x1, 0x5e47d98920, 0x4000081080)
        /data/data/com.termux/files/home/go/pkg/mod/github.com/spf13/cobra@v1.1.3/command.go:856 +0x1c8
github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).ExecuteC(0x5e47d90720, 0x0, 0x4000000180, 0x4000052000)
        /data/data/com.termux/files/home/go/pkg/mod/github.com/spf13/cobra@v1.1.3/command.go:960 +0x24c
github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).Execute(...)
        /data/data/com.termux/files/home/go/pkg/mod/github.com/spf13/cobra@v1.1.3/command.go:897
github.com/rclone/rclone/cmd.Main()
        /data/data/com.termux/files/home/go/pkg/mod/github.com/rclone/rclone@v1.55.1-0.20210420123827-c3d1fbdbf616/cmd/cmd.go:566 +0x94
main.main()
        /data/data/com.termux/files/home/go/pkg/mod/github.com/rclone/rclone@v1.55.1-0.20210420123827-c3d1fbdbf616/rclone.go:14 +0x18
```

Edit: It seems like the new termbox changes was not built? the error says termbox-go@v1.1.0, how do i rectify this? or am i doing something wrong?

@ncw
I can no longer get it to crash, the fix forks works me. (with [c3d1fbd armv8a](https://beta.rclone.org/branch/fix-5259-ncdu/v1.56.0-beta.1.c3d1fbd.fix-5259-ncdu/testbuilds/rclone-android-21-armv8a.gz)).

> 
> 
> @ncw
> I can no longer get it to crash, the fix forks works me. (with [c3d1fbd armv8a](https://beta.rclone.org/branch/fix-5259-ncdu/v1.56.0-beta.1.c3d1fbd.fix-5259-ncdu/testbuilds/rclone-android-21-armv8a.gz)).

Hi, could you kindly teach me how to properly compile this from the branch? I have never really used golang before nor compiled program

@tomyummmm I've directly linked to a compressed binary build, which is already compiled. You only need to download and extract the archive. 

Compiling from source also works for me, though I did [follow the traditional route](https://rclone.org/install/#install-from-source]) with `git clone -b fix-5259-ncdu https://github.com/rclone/rclone.git` to get the correct branch.

@ncw 
This issue seems to be resolved, tested to be working in both bash and zsh, and doesnt cause the weird issue of bash not showing what im typing anymore. Thank you!

Great thank you for testing.

I'll reopen this as a reminder that we need to merge a fix from upstream.

> ...and doesnt cause the weird issue of bash not showing what im typing anymore. Thank you!

If you get that, type the command `reset` and all will be well after. You'll probably have to do it blind but it will fixup your terminal.

I've also noticed that the betas for the android builds are going into the wrong place so I'll try to fix that next!

This fix has now been merged upstream. If this works for you I'll merge it to master :-)

[v1.56.0-beta.5424.54392fbf2.fix-5259-ncdu](https://beta.rclone.org/branch/fix-5259-ncdu/v1.56.0-beta.5424.54392fbf2.fix-5259-ncdu/) on branch [fix-5259-ncdu](https://github.com/rclone/rclone/tree/fix-5259-ncdu) (uploaded in 15-30 mins)
